<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>89539</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DUNEL_sample</catalog>
            <entry>0006</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">KS2 Maths Y5 Mental maths</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">KS2 Geistesmathe Mathe Y5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">KS2 maths mentales des maths Y5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">KS2 maths mentais dos maths Y5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">KS2 per la matematica mentali di per la 
matematica Y5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">KS2 διανοητικά μαθηματικά μαθηματικών Y5</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">KS2 matemáticas mental de la matemáticas Y5</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Listen to Audio, use mental calculation strategies for addition, subtraction, multiplication and division, Use mental calculation strategies and to do sums mentally such as partitioning, Use closely related facts and adjusting, Using doubling or halving, starting from known facts.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mental maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mental calculation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">multiplication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Sie zum Audio, Gebrauchgeistesberechnung 
Strategien für Hinzufügung, Abzug, Vermehrung und Abteilung, 
verwenden Geistesberechnung Strategien und Summen wie Verteilen, in 
Verbindung gestandene Tatsachen des Gebrauches nah und Justage mit der
Verdoppelung oder dem Halbieren geistlich zu tun und fahren von 
bekannten Tatsachen ab.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoutez l'acoustique, stratégies mentales de 
calcul d'utilisation pour l'ajout, soustraction, multiplication et la 
division, utilisent des stratégies mentales de calcul et pour faire 
des sommes mentalement comme la division, les faits étroitement liés
d'utilisation et l'ajustement, en utilisant doubler ou se réduire de 
moitié, à partir des faits connus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escute o áudio, estratégias mentais do cálculo
do uso para a adição, subtração, multiplicação e a divisão, usa
estratégias mentais do cálculo e para fazer mentalmente somas como 
dividir, fatos pròxima relacionados do uso e ajuste, usando dobrar ou
halving, partindo dos fatos sabidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ascolti audio, strategie mentali di calcolo di 
uso per l'aggiunta, la sottrazione, moltiplicazione e la divisione, 
usa le strategie mentali di calcolo e fare mentalmente le somme come 
dividere, i fatti strettamente collegati di uso e registrazione, 
usando raddoppiarsi o dimezzare, a partire dai fatti conosciuti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακούστε τον ήχο, διανοητικές στρατηγικές υπολογισμού 
χρήσης για την προσθήκη, αφαίρεση, πολλαπλασιασμός και το τμήμα, 
χρησιμοποιεί τις διανοητικές στρατηγικές υπολογισμού και για να 
κάνει τα ποσά διανοητικά όπως ο χωρισμός, τα σχετικά γεγονότα 
χρήσης πολύ και η ρύθμιση, χρησιμοποιώντας το διπλασιασμό ή τη 
διχοτόμηση, αρχικός από τα γνωστά γεγονότα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escuche el audio, estrategias mentales del 
cálculo del uso para la adición, substracción, multiplicación y la
división, utiliza estrategias mentales del cálculo y hacer sumas 
mentalmente por ejemplo repartir, hechos de cerca relacionados del uso
y el ajuste, usando doblar o la partición en dos, saliendo de hechos 
sabidos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geistesmathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hinzufügung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geistesberechnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abzug</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vermehrung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abteilung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">maths mentales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ajout</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calcul mental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">soustraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">multiplication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">maths mentais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">adição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cálculo mental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">subtração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">multiplicação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">divisão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aggiunta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
